headline: Is Citi’s 49% Stock Surge Justified Amid Regulatory Changes and Earnings Growth?
summary: Curious if Citigroup's stock is a hidden gem or fully priced in? Let’s break down what’s going on beneath the surface so you know exactly where its value stands today. In the last year alone, Citigroup has surged by 49.4%, and it's up an impressive 43.4% year-to-date, even as recent weeks saw some price swings. Recent headlines have highlighted regulatory shifts and banking sector updates that could signal changing tides for big banks like Citi. These news stories may be helping to shape...
